trans-unit.resname: G10·2 | Natural Order | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature.
trans-unit.target: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature.

trans-unit.resname: G10·2 | Natural Order | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: G10·3 | Phyrexian Dreadnought | Card Text | Paragraph 1
G10·3 | Phyrexian Dreadnought | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice any number of creatures with total power 12 or greater.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice any number of creatures with total power 12 or greater.

trans-unit.resname: G10·4 | Thawing Glaciers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
G10·4 | Thawing Glaciers | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
trans-unit.target: {1}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

trans-unit.resname: G10·5 | Land Tax | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.source: {U}: CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {U}: CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.

trans-unit.target: {U}: CARDNAME gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

trans-unit.resname: G10·7 | Wheel of Fortune | Card Name
G10·7 | Wheel of Fortune | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
trans-unit.target: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
